title: Ticket #4979: Documentation for using cgroups on RHEL7 insufficient
description:
The documentation in the manual for enabling cgroups is incorrect for RHEL7 (and any other distro that is running systemd). See this thread in htcondor-users.

Documentation should be improved to clearly state how which platforms correctly support cgroups with HTCondor, and to clearly document how to enable cgroups on each platform supported.
